sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' class PollResults extends Component { render() { const { question } = this.props const optionOneCount = question.optionOne.votes.length const optionTwoCount = question.optionTwo.votes.length const total = optionOneCount + optionTwoCount const optionOnePercentage = (optionOneCount * 100 ) / total const optionTwoPercentage = (optionTwoCount * 100 ) / total return (
Would you rather {question.optionOne.text}
Would you rather {question.optionTwo.text}
50%
)} } export default PollResults
